header.title: List of Game Boy Advance games

game.bdy:
This is a list of games for the
Game Boy Advance handheld game system, organized alphabetically by name. This includes games released in the US, Japan, and Europe for the system. These games can be used for the following platforms:
Game Boy Advance ,
Game Boy Advance SP , Gamecube (using the
Game Boy Player ),
Game Boy Micro and
Nintendo DS ,
Nintendo DS Lite . See Lists of video games for related lists.
Contents
